skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff on the target for 2 turns before attacking.

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Applies a [Debuff Spread] effect, taking 2 random debuffs from the target and placing them on all enemies. Also extends the duration of those debuffs by 2 turns.
Will not extend the duration of debuffs on the initial target.
skills.name: Infectious Panic
